text:
Working together with Enoshiman,
[Player] and the others skillfully repelled the monsters—

They were surrounded by the children they had rescued,
who showered them with shouts of praise.

name: Island Kid
text:
So cool!
You big brothers are heroes too!

name: Island Kid
text:
You were as strong as Enoshiman!
Thank you for helping us!

name: Yohack
text:
You're welcome!
It was easy for us to fight
because everyone stepped back!

name: Island Kid
text:
Hehe, aren't we great!
It's an important promise
between Enoshiman and us!

name: Island Kid
text:
All the kids on the island
properly keep their promises!
Right, Sa-chan!

name: Saotome
text:
Wahahaha!
You were great for properly
keeping your promise today too!

name: Saotome
text:
When a monster appears,
you cheer for Enoshiman
from a step back—

name: Saotome
text:
With that promise,
the children are allowed to play
outside their homes!

name: Astar
text:
...I see.
Good children who keep their promises
will surely have wonderful things happen to them.

name: Island Kid
text:
The doggy hero, and this hero...
Could you be, Santa-san!?

name: Astar
text:
Hohoho!
That's right, that's right. Believe it or not,
I am "Santa".

name: Island Kid
text:
Oh, really~!
It's weird to be dressed for winter in summer~!
You're a scatterbrain~!

name: Astar
text: (Speechless)

name: Island Kid
text:
Hey, you!
How dare you say such a thing
to Santa-san who helped us!

name: Island Kid
text:
Don't come crying to me if you don't
get a present this Christmas!

name: Astar
text:
I-It's fine.
Honesty is a child's virtue.
You must be a good child too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Um, [Player]-san?
Why are you so happy?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Or rather,
Astar-san is about to collapse!?

name: Astar
text:
...No, I'm fine.
It was merely a problem with my acting policy.
I should frankly admit it and reflect.

name: Astar
text:
However, this is a grave problem...
It's too early in the calendar for "Santa".
To not break the children's interpretation... (muttering).

Astar, pondering his future course of action, and
Yohack, looking at him worriedly.

As [Player] hesitated about what to say,
the children gathered around [Player]
one after another.

name: Island Kid
text:
And then,
is this person the Operator?
I've never seen one live before!

name: Island Kid
text: Enoshiman always fights alone, right~!

name: Island Kid
text:
You were cool like a commander!
I want to see you fight with Enoshiman again~!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wahahaha!
[Player]-kun, you know exactly how to make
children happy~!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
In this case, it's possible that [Player]
is saying it genuinely...
No, I won't say any more.

options.text: Look forward to the next battle!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wahahaha!
[Player]-kun, you know exactly how to make
children happy~!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
In this case, it's possible that [Player]
is saying it genuinely...
No, I won't say any more.

text:
Bidding farewell to the children,
who waved their hands in gratitude,
the group once again set off towards the village office.

Along the way,
Astar voiced a question.

name: Astar
text:
...By the way, Saotome.
Who exactly is Enoshiman?
With that ability, he doesn't seem like just anyone.

name: Yohack
text:
Indeed, his movements were amazing!
It's like he knows exactly how to fight
monsters...

options.text: He was incredibly popular with the kids too.

name: Saotome
text:
Ohh, that's right, that's right.
Sorry for the late explanation!

name: Saotome
text:
I had intended to talk about it eventually,
but the monster appeared
before I could.

name: Saotome
text:
He alone
protects Enoshima.

name: Saotome
text:
No one has seen his true face, but
when a monster appears, he makes a dashing entrance,
and fights to protect the islanders—

name: Saotome
text:
—That's the local hero who protects Enoshima.
His name is "Enoshiman"!

Saotome praised the local hero "Enoshiman",
with gratitude permeating his words.

name: Astar
text:
...I see.
If he's the only hero living on the island,
it makes sense that he has extensive combat experience with monsters.

name: Yohack
text:
Perhaps that experience
supports Enoshiman-san's strength!

name: Saotome
text:
Not only is he exceptionally strong, but he's also renowned
for his flashy performances!
And he's very popular with the children!

name: Saotome
text:
When monsters appear,
it inevitably dampens the mood, but
Enoshiman breaks through that atmosphere—

name: Saotome
text:
He provides us with safety and fun...
He's truly a grateful person!

name: Yohack
text:
So, the children of Enoshima can play
energetically outside thanks to Enoshiman-san.

name: Astar
text:
His flashy performances bring
smiles to those children, then.

Next to Yohack and Astar, who nodded
as if they understood—

name: Saotome
text:
On this island with little entertainment,
he makes the children smile.
In that sense, he's truly grateful—

options.text: Huh, what did you just say...?

name: Saotome
text:
—No, no,
I was just speaking to myself,
please don't mind it!

name: Saotome
text:
Well then, let's get back on track,
and head to the Enoshima Village Office!

Saotome, glossing over the words that had
accidentally slipped out, resumed guiding the group.

And [Player] and the others arrived
at the Enoshima Village Office.

name: Saotome
text:
Ah, I got carried away and explored everywhere,
so it took longer than I thought!

options.text: It was fun seeing various things!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wahahaha!
I was so happy to guide guests, I accidentally took a slight detour!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text: [Player]-kun, if you are okay with it, I can guide you to many more places!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wahahaha!
I was so happy to guide guests, I accidentally took a slight detour!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text: [Player]-kun, if you are okay with it, I can guide you to many more places!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, I'm sorry!
I was so engrossed in guiding you, but it must have been tough with the inclines!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text: I'll secretly treat you to something sweet later, so can you forgive me with that...?
Unlike [Player], who complained of fatigue to Saotome—

name: Yohack
text:
It was a pleasant walk
with lots of nature.
The islanders welcomed us too!

name: Astar
text:
It served as a preliminary site visit.
If we understand the surrounding environment,
the efficiency of our work should increase accordingly.

Saotome spoke to Yohack and Astar,
who seemed unfazed by the moderate exercise.

name: Saotome
text:
As expected of heroes!
Even after walking quite a bit,
you're not even out of breath.

name: Yohack
text:
It's thanks to the comfortable climate!
I'm used to the heat of Estevolta,
so the cool breeze felt just right!

name: Astar
text:
...Building physical strength is fundamental for "Santa".
If I were to give up with this much exercise,
I wouldn't be able to fulfill my duties at all.

name: Saotome
text:
Ohh, that's truly reassuring!
And while we're on the subject of reassuring—

name: Saotome
text:
I'd like the two heroes
to come with me to the warehouse out back...

name: Yohack
text:
Of course, that's fine, but
just the two of us?
[Player]-san is...

name: Saotome
text:
Hmm, let's see.
Of course, [Player]-kun can
come along too, but...

name: Saotome
text:
Since we're here,
I think I'll have [Player]-kun
wait here.

name: Saotome
text:
...Hehehe.
It's better to save the fun for later,
as it will have more impact!

name: Astar
text:
If [Player] is okay with that,
I have no objections, but...

name: Saotome
text:
It's settled!
Well then, [Player]-kun,
have a soda and relax!

name: Saotome
text:
It's a local soda made in Enoshima,
and it tastes quite good!

Saotome, having said that,
poured carbonated water into
a chilled glass—

Then took Astar and Yohack
and headed to the warehouse behind the village office.

As [Player] drank the soda, they heard
footsteps entering the village office.

name: Shadowy Town Hall Employee?
text:
—Good work.
I'm back.

options.text: Is it someone from the village office?

text:
Just as [Player] stood up to
call Saotome—

[Player] sensed that a path to a parallel universe
was slightly open.

options.text: It feels off, but I can't describe it.

text:
The person who entered the village office
looked at [Player] with a surprised expression.

name: Shadowy Town Hall Employee?
text:
—My apologies.
You're the one who came for the request
from Enoshima, aren't you?

name: Shiratori
text:
I apologize for the delay, but
I am Shiratori, a staff member of the village office.

On this island, where there are no heroes or Operators
other than Enoshiman, the person who appeared before them
had a path open around them.

Understanding what that fact implied,
[Player] widened their eyes.

options.text: (He said he's a staff member of the village office, but...)

name: Shiratori
text:
—Um, are you alright?
You look pale...
Perhaps my face is scary...?

name: Shiratori
text:
I'm sometimes told that I'm scary
because I'm too expressionless.
I try to fix it, but...

options.text: (I feel like it'd be rude to point it out, but...)

text:
To [Player], who was at a loss for words,
Shiratori asked another question.

name: Shiratori
text:
You've been staring intently
into space for a while now...

name: Shiratori
text:
Could it be that
you're seeing something...?

Receiving Shiratori's question,
and realizing they couldn't evade it,
[Player] confessed honestly.

options.text: More like a remnant of a path...
A path is open around you.
Since I'm an "Observer", I can see paths...

text:
When [Player] said that,
Shiratori visibly panicked.

name: Shiratori
text:
N-No way...!
Could it be, in this way...!?

And, with a pale face,
he opened his mouth again
towards [Player].

name: Shiratori
text:
Th-Then...
You've already guessed who I am, haven't you...?

When [Player] nodded subtly,
Shiratori opened his mouth, like he has resigned.

name: Shiratori
text:
I heard that an excellent "Observer" would be coming,
but to think you can observe even that...!

name: Shiratori
text:
...As you might have guessed.
The true identity of Enoshima's local hero,
"Enoshiman", is me.

Hah-hah-hah!
Responding to the voices of the children who call my name,
the local hero who protects Enoshima—

name: Enoshiman
text: —Enoshiman, has arrived!!

name: Shiratori
text:
To think my true identity would be revealed
in such a way...

name: Shiratori
text:
Did patrolling in my transformed state
backfire...?

Shiratori's dejected appearance was
completely different from his first impression (Enoshiman).

options.text: Your character is different from earlier, isn't it!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiratori
dialogue_after_selection.text: W-When you point that out, I feel incredibly apologetic, or rather...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiratori
dialogue_after_selection.text: I myself am aware that I'm doing something inappropriate, so...

options.text: Your true face is really cool too...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiratori
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eh...?
My true face...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiratori
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm sorry.
I've never received such words, so I don't know what to say in return...

text:
After exchanging a few words,
Shiratori bowed deeply towards [Player].

name: Shiratori
text:
It pains me greatly to ask this
right after meeting you, but...

name: Shiratori
text:
Please, could you keep Enoshiman's
true identity a secret...?

options.text: You don't want it to be known, right?

name: Shiratori
text:
Since I'm asking a favor,
I must properly explain it
to you, [Player]-san.

name: Shiratori
text:
If it's known that a plain person like me
is Enoshiman, the children's dreams
might be shattered...

name: Shiratori
text:
As Enoshima's local hero,
that must be avoided at all costs.
That's what I believe.

name: Shiratori
text:
...Therefore,
I would like you to think of me
as just "Shiratori".

name: Shiratori
text:
Thank you.
I'm truly glad that you're
such a kind person...

name: Shiratori
text:
Having my true identity known
is more unbearable to me
than being torn apart...

And so, [Player] unexpectedly
learned Enoshiman's true identity—

name: Saotome
text:
[Player]-kun~!
Sorry for making you wait!

Around the time the conversation with Shiratori settled down,
Saotome and the others returned from the warehouse.

name: Saotome
text:
Oh, Shiratori-kun, you're back too!
How was today's patrol?

name: Shiratori
text:
There were two monster appearances,
but thanks to Enoshiman's efforts,
they were safely resolved.

name: Shiratori
text:
Saotome-san, you were also present,
so I'm sure you'd know,
but one of them was...

name: Shiratori
text:
It seems [Player]-san and the others
also lent their assistance.
Thank you very much.

name: Saotome
text:
I see, I see!
Thank you for the report!

name: Yohack
text:
Um, [Player]-san.
This person is...?

options.text: This is Shiratori-san from the village office.
They just returned to the office...

text:
Hearing [Player]'s words,
Shiratori spoke to Yohack and the others.

name: Shiratori
text:
...I've been introduced.
I am Shiratori, a staff member of the village office.
It's a pleasure to meet you again.

name: Saotome
text:
Now that Shiratori-kun is back,
I'll explain the details of this project
once again!

name: Saotome
text:
As I mentioned on the way,
I want to revitalize Enoshima and make it
a more enjoyable place to live!

name: Saotome
text:
I want to show the people of this island,
and the children with infinite potential,
a brighter future!

name: Saotome
text:
With that in mind,
I've been working on various projects
with Shiratori-kun and others!

name: Shiratori
text:
From promoting the Enoshima Village Dance,
to participating in the Mascot Grand Prix—

name: Shiratori
text:
In addition to that,
we've been operating various large and small projects
to revitalize the village.

name: Astar
text:
...I see.
So you've tried just about
everything you could.

name: Yohack
text:
Indeed, since coming to Enoshima,
I've seen white animal characters
in various places...!

name: Saotome
text:
Ohh, you noticed!
This child is Enoshima's mascot—

name: Saotome
text:
—It's Shinyasu-kun!
My clothes also have a Shinyasu-kun
patch on them!

name: Saotome
text:
And it's so cute...
Here, take a good look!

Saotome, praised for Shinyasu-kun,
happily showed off his patch.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wahahaha!
[Player]-kun, you seem to have an eye for mascots too!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text: Perhaps, even without realizing it, you have the potential to be a mascot judge!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiratori
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm sorry, [Player]-san.
Saotome-san is saying strange things...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiratori
dialogue_after_selection.text: When Saotome-san is praised for Shinyasu-kun, he always becomes like this...

options.text: An old man who loves mascots... Nice!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]-kun?
Why are you smiling at me instead of Shinyasu-kun?

options.text: If you look closely, there are so many Shinyasu-kun(s)!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wahahaha!
Aren't they all cute and nice?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]-kun, I'll give them to you and the others as a souvenir!
I'll go to the sales department now and—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiratori
dialogue_after_selection.text:
—Saotome-san.
I think it's about time to return to the main topic...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oops, sorry, sorry.
I got a bit carried away.

text:
Saotome returned to the topic and
resumed explaining the situation.

name: Saotome
text:
...So, we've been working on
reconstruction with every possible method,
but we haven't achieved favorable results.

name: Shiratori
text:
While doing so,
the population of Enoshima has been gradually
decreasing, which is the current situation.

name: Saotome
text:
In such a situation,
the make-or-break plan we launched is
this crowdfunding project—

name: Saotome
text:
"Local Heroes Assemble in Enoshima"
—that's the idea!

name: Saotome
text:
Haa...
I've tried every possible method I could think of,
but what should I do next...?

Saotome spread out documents on his home table,
and was brainstorming plans to revitalize Enoshima.

name: Saotome's Son
text:
Hey, Dad.
How about this?

On the screen of the device his son, Yuto, offered,
it read "Crowdfunding Project: Heroes and Local PR!"
in a cheerful font.

name: Saotome
text:
Yuto...?
What is this...?

name: Saotome's Son
text:
This is a project from a distant planet.
Many of my favorite heroes
are participating!

name: Saotome's Son
text:
I got an idea when I saw this!
I wondered if we could do the same thing
in Enoshima!

name: Saotome
text:
For me and Enoshima,
you've been thinking about various things too.
Thank you, Yuto.

name: Saotome
text:
Let's see...
A crowdfunding project for
local PR, huh...

He read through the project outline while researching
crowdfunding, which was not a very familiar concept.

The strategy of placing heroes at the center of the project
to gather recognition and support
seemed truly logical.

name: Saotome
text:
—This might indeed be
perfect for Enoshima.

name: Saotome
text:
However, besides Enoshiman,
I hardly know any other heroes.
Who should I ask...?

name: Saotome's Son
text: Leave the heroes to me, Dad!

name: Saotome
text:
And then,
with the help of my son and Shiratori-kun,
we formulated this plan!

name: Shiratori
text:
Inviting local heroes from all over the universe
with crowdfunding funds—

name: Saotome
text:
—And having them help with Enoshima's PR
while producing supporter rewards!
It's a bit roundabout, but a good idea, right?

name: Yohack
text:
...I see!
I completely understand!
You've worked hard on various things!!

name: Astar
text:
...You, do you truly understand?
What does that "crowd-something" mean?
I'm unfamiliar with such things, tell me.

name: Yohack
text:
Eh!? H-Huh...!
It's about collecting money!!
Am I right!? Right!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Right!?
I properly listen to these kinds of stories!!

options.text: Are you answering on a whim...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
N-No, that's not it!!
I understand the general idea!!

name: Yohack
text:
Anyway, leave it to me!
I'll give it my all to make sure
more people learn about Enoshima!

In contrast to Yohack, who thumped his chest,
Astar voiced a question.

name: Astar
text:
I understand the circumstances, but
for a "Local Heroes Assemble",
isn't the scale a bit modest?

name: Astar
text:
Even including me, Yohack,
and Enoshiman, it's only
a total of three people, that's a bit...

name: Yohack
text:
I think that part
will probably be fine!

name: Yohack
text:
Kiloc-san and Joezen-kun are also
scheduled to come!

options.text: I wonder if Joezen-kun is doing well?
Still only five people in total, though...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course,
we're also soliciting requests
from other heroes!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiratori
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...However,
since it was a sudden invitation,
we don't know yet if they'll accept.

name: Yohack
text:
Actually, the first ones to receive the request
were Kiloc-san and Joezen-kun.

name: Yohack
text:
However, both of them were busy with ship operations,
so they would be late in arriving at Enoshima...

name: Yohack
text:
So I,
since my schedule was open,
I came earlier!

name: Saotome
text:
Ohh!
I'm sorry for asking too much
of Yohack-kun and the others, but...

name: Saotome
text:
You coming early
have really helped us out!

name: Saotome
text:
After all, we launched the project and
reached our target amount so quickly,
that we couldn't keep up with the preparations at all!

name: Shiratori
text:
Project upgrades and
additional production of supporter rewards...
There's a mountain of things to do.

options.text: You're not keeping up with preparations!?
This project is quite a leap of faith...!
Hmm, I'm a bit worried about the future...

name: Astar
text:
...Complaining won't help, will it?
All we can do is finish the immediate tasks
one by one.

name: Yohack
text:
That's right!
Even if there's a mountain of work,
I'm sure we can finish it if we try our best!

name: Saotome
text:
H-How reassuring!
I'm truly glad I asked
everyone for this request...!

name: Shiratori
text:
Saotome-san.
I understand you feel like crying, but
we need to get to work now...

name: Saotome
text:
Sniffle...
Shiratori-kun is right.

name: Saotome
text:
Well then, let's get to work right away.
The first thing we need to produce is
the main supporter reward—

name: Saotome
text: The Hero Swimsuit Calendar!

name: Yohack
text: Hero—

name: Astar
text: Swimsuit—

Chapter 2:
Local Heroes Assemble!

And so, the first day of the event arrived.
At the platform of Enoshima Station
were [Player] and the others.

name: Saotome
text:
Thanks to Yohack-kun, Astar-kun, and [Player]-kun,
we managed to complete the preparations by today!

name: Shiratori
text:
To be honest,
we wouldn't have made it in time
by ourselves.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...That much is no problem.
Considering my daily training.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Astar-san,
what kind of training
do you usually do!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ehehe!
It was worth helping out
in Estevolta every day!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I see.
So Yohack usually places himself
on the giving side.

name: Saotome
text:
Everyone, thank you so much!
To be able to welcome this day safely,
I... I...!

name: Shiratori
text:
Saotome-san...?
I think it's a bit too early to rejoice...

name: Astar
text:
Shiratori is right,
the event hasn't even started yet.
Wipe your tears and look forward, Saotome.

name: Yohack
text:
We'll do our best too,
so let's make the event
a huge success no matter what!

As they waited for the appointed time,
all of them trying to calm Saotome,
who seemed already overwhelmed with emotion—

The sea train "EnoRail" arrived at the station,
emitting an electronic high-frequency sound
different from a typical train.

name: Enoshima Group
text:
Local heroes, everyone!
Welcome to Enoshima—!

The heroes who disembarked from EnoRail,
exchanged words with [Player]
while being welcomed by Saotome and the others.

name: Kiloc
text:
Long time no see, [Player]-chan!
I'm a lucky man to be able to work
with a cute person like you!

name: Kiloc
text:
Just so you know,
I'll do my job properly,
so I want a reward when it's over~?

name: Joezen
text:
It's a long-awaited reunion with [Player]-san,
and that's the first thing you say!?

name: Joezen
text:
...Well, I can somewhat understand
the feeling of being overjoyed to meet [Player]-san.

options.text: I'm happy to be with you too, Kiloc!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kiloc
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh!
[Player]-chan, you always say such happy things!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kiloc
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, I guess I'll have to really buckle down and do my best.
You can expect a decent amount from me!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Joezen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Thanks to you!
This time, of course, coming to Earth...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Joezen
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...I've also been looking forward to meeting you!

name: Senthak
text:
Yo, [Player]-kun!
It's been a while since the Christmas event!
How have you been?

name: Alend
text:
Long time no see, [Player].
I'm glad to be able to work with
an excellent Operator like you again.

name: Alend
text:
However,
I'm not even a hero on the immigrant ship.
I thought I was unsuitable for this request, but...

name: Senthak
text:
I insisted and asked
Alend-kun for his cooperation too!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Senthak
dialogue_after_selection.text: It's a given for Alend-kun, but I'm also incredibly happy to be with you, [Player]-kun!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Senthak
dialogue_after_selection.text: For me, it's my memorable first job since officially becoming a hero!

options.text: Alend-san, you are very caring, aren't you!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Alend
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I've been entrusted by Maculata-san to be Senthak's mentor...
That's one reason.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Alend
dialogue_after_selection.text: He wanted to accept his first job as a member of the agency together with me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Alend
dialogue_after_selection.text: I don't intend to be so heartless as to refuse when a friend tells me that.

text:
Saotome and Shiratori's eyes widened
at [Player], who was exchanging words
with the heroes gathered there.

name: Saotome
text:
I'm surprised...!
Putting aside Yohack-kun and Astar-kun,
to think you know all the heroes...!

name: Shiratori
text:
I heard you had many acquaintances,
but seeing it in person is
still surprising...

name: Kiloc
text:
[Player]-chan is a renowned Operator!
This much is only natural!

name: Alend
text:
[Player] has helped
me and Senthak a great deal.
They'll do a good job this time too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]-san!?
If you feel like you're going to break down, please rely on me!

text:
Thus, the local hero group,
gathered at Enoshima Station—

Had the details of the request explained again
by Saotome and Shiratori
on the way to the village office.

And, having finished their preparations,
the group headed to Enoshima Beach.

name: Saotome
text:
Oh, I almost forgot.
I should give you this.

What Saotome handed over was
a bottle shining with an amber color.

name: Saotome
text:
This, believe it or not,
is sun oil made in Enoshima!

name: Saotome
text:
The sun is strong today,
so feel free to use it!

name: Saotome
text:
It's an excellent product,
perfect for your skin, and even
for grooming your fur!

name: Saotome
text:
Moreover, this sun oil has
a dramatic origin story, so sad to hear, so sad to tell—!

name: Shiratori
text:
...Saotome-san.
You're getting off topic.

name: Shiratori
text:
It's about time to
return to the event's progress.

name: Saotome
text:
Th-That's right!
I'll tell you the rest of this story
slowly later!

Saotome, reprimanded by Shiratori,
regained his composure and called out to the heroes.

name: Saotome
text:
Ahem.
Well then, let's get back to it—

name: Saotome
text:
Local heroes, everyone!
Are you ready to head out to Enoshima Beach!?

name: All
text: Ohh—!!

Thus, the biggest supporter reward
for this crowdfunding project—

—The production of the swimsuit calendar
by local heroes began.
